note: Freelance Writer & Digital Marketing Strategist | Crafting Content that Informs, Engages, Influences, and Inspires. I wrote Empowering Communities to provide readers with practical insights on how to make a meaningful difference in their communities. I'm also a person of eclectic interests: photography, science, nature, music, amateur radio, beekeeping, woodworking, and messing about in boats, to name a few.
